instruction:
Given the following job description, create a tailored resume:

Job Title: Machine Learning / Artificial Intelligence Researcher, Intern

Job Description:
Job Description
We are seeking intern with the drive for success, passion for technology and Real Estate and a heart for making a difference to join our diverse and dynamic team to revolutionize the property management industry.
Key Responsibilities:
As a Machine Learning researcher your main role will be to work collaboratively with a team of product engineering to Experiment and Develop the entire model development lifecycle, building, testing, and delivering high-quality solutions. You will also evaluate both new models and research techniques that could be used by our AI development teams for new product.
Requirements:
Current PhD student or recent Master's graduate in a relevant ML discipline.
Practical and relevant experience building NLP/IR/ML systems, from ideation to implementation.
Software engineering skills for model prototyping.
Proficiency in implementing solutions using Python, DL frameworks, and relevant tools.
Familiarity with workflows for remote development on AWS, Azure, or similar.
Data-driven problem-solving and decision-making mindset.
Comfortable communicating AI concepts to audiences with diverse technical backgrounds.
Ability to translate academic research into working prototypes and experience identifying novel solutions to solve real-world problems.
Familiarity with generative AI and large language models (LLMs).
Why you should join us
Do you want to make a difference? Be part of a team revolutionizing the real estate industrial sector? Our products and services include highly specialized information-enabled software and tools for housing/real estate operations, and compliance.
You will have rare opportunity to shape a groundbreaking solutions in the real estate/housing sector.
SATHVIK ADDICHARLA
Denton, TX 76207 | sathvikaddicharla@my.unt.edu | +1 (940) 597-5745 | [GitHub] | [LinkedIn]
PROFESSIONAL SUMMARY
AI researcher and NLP engineer with hands-on experience across the full ML lifecycle—from ideation and prototyping to cloud deployment. Demonstrated expertise in building and experimenting with LLM-based architectures for practical, scalable applications. Strong research foundation (2 IEEE publications) in multimodal AI, diagnostic assistants, and emotion-aware models. Adept at translating academic ideas into real-world systems across domains including healthcare and customer interaction.
TECHNICAL SKILLS
ML & Generative AI: LLMs (GPT, RAG, Whisper), Hugging Face, LangChain, BERT, LSTM
Languages & Frameworks: Python, TensorFlow, PyTorch, Scikit-learn
Cloud & Deployment: AWS (S3, Lambda), Docker, MLflow, REST API
NLP/NLU: Summarization, retrieval, embeddings, prompt tuning, LangGraph
IR & Data: Vector search (FAISS), MongoDB, SQL, Pandas
Other: Git, JSON, VSCode, remote team collaboration
EDUCATION
Master’s in Data Science
University of North Texas | 04/2024 – 08/2026 | GPA: 3.66/4.0
Bachelor’s in Computer Science – Data Science
VNR Vignana Jyothi Institute of Technology, India | GPA: 8.60/10
EXPERIENCE
AI/ML Engineer Intern
Cantellate Software Pvt Ltd | Hyderabad | 03/2023 – 09/2023
Led ideation-to-deployment cycle of a LangChain-powered RAG assistant for product intelligence.
Tuned model performance using MLflow; ran comparative benchmarking across prompt/embedding variants.
Applied Whisper for real-time transcription and integrated with semantic search (FAISS) for audio-indexing.
Deployed on AWS using Lambda functions and RESTful API endpoints for scalable user access.
PROJECTS
Diagnostic AI Assistant for Health (RAG + Transformers)
Translated academic RAG architecture into a multilingual health assistant.
Modeled reasoning chains using LangGraph and deployed with live monitoring using MLflow.
NLP Summarizer for YouTube & Podcast Content (Whisper + FAISS)
Extracted key segments using Whisper transcription + embedding-based content ranking.
Adapted LLM-generated summaries to support commercial use cases (media, ecommerce).
Speech Emotion Recognition using MFCC + LSTM
Built supervised model for classifying emotion from real-world speech recordings.
Optimized for high noise tolerance to simulate field deployment.
CERTIFICATIONS & TRAINING
Deep Learning – NPTEL (IIT Ropar)
Training LLMs with Your Own Data – DeepLearning.ai
Python for Data Science – Udemy
PUBLICATIONS
Multimodal Diagnostic Chatbot using RAG + LLMs – IEEE (Sep 2024)
Transfer Learning for Child Autism Detection – IEEE (Aug 2024)

Please create a tailored resume that highlights relevant skills and experience for this position.
output: Here is a tailored resume for the Machine Learning / Artificial Intelligence Researcher, Intern position:
